Header.title: Individual Software Development Consultancy
Header.paragraph: You can get help from our large software team in line with your needs and demands.

About.paragraph: B2i is a software company that can produce fast solutions with its agile team structure to accelerate all software processes of companies. You can get development, consultancy and training services with staff who are well-versed in current technologies.

Services.name: Software Development
Services.text: Bring your application idea to life with our team that is well-versed in up-to-date software technologies.

Services.name: Software and DevOps Consultancy
Services.text: Get daily or hourly support from our staff for Software and DevOps issues.

Services.name: TOGAF and ITIL
Services.text: Get training and consultancy from our personnel who have TOGAF and ITIL certificates on system management.

Services.name: Project Management
Services.text: Keep your project processes under control with Agile and devops methodology. Benefit from Scrum master consulting.

Services.name: Cyber Security
Services.text: Get advice and support from the experts to protect your system.

Services.name: UX/UI
Services.text: Bring the user-friendly screens of your dream application, consisting of unique designs, together with your customers.

Features.title: DevOps Consultancy
Features.text: Automate development and deployment of your applications at any stage of your apps’ life cycle.

Features.title: Cyber Security
Features.text: Protect your systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.
